UnitDefinition.Name: Kinetic conversion factor uncertainty distribution types.
UnitDefinition.Description: Kinetic conversion factor uncertainty distribution types.

Unit.Name: LogNormal
Unit.Description: Lognormal distribution parameterised by a mean and upper p95 percentile.

Unit.Name: Uniform
Unit.Description: Uniform distribution specified by a mean/median and an upper boundary of the distribution.

Unit.Name: InverseUniform
Unit.Description: Inverse uniform distribution specified by a median and an upper boundary of the distribution.
